Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 11-2014. A man with 
traumatic injuries after a bomb explosion at the Boston Marathon.

Eikermann M, Velmahos G, Abbara S, Huang PL, Fagan SP, Hirschberg RE, Kwon JY, 
Nosé V.

Erratum in
    N Engl J Med. 2014 Jun 12;370(24):2354.
